objects.photodata:

Title Gibbous Moon on 9/5/17.

Description Gibbous Moon on 9/5/17. Lunar North is roughly up and West roughly left. Featuring the rayed crater Copernicus (below center), Mare Imbrium (center left), boardered on the East by the Apennine Mountains. The walled plain, Plato, is the dark feature to the top left. 1/80 sec with Canon T5i on the C11.

objects.photodata:
Creator JCP

Title Gibbous Moon on 5/24/18 from video.

Description Gibbous Moon on 5/24/18. Mare Tranquillitatus is center and Mare Serenitatus is to its right. A high-contrast image created from a 60 fps Canon T5i video taken at 1280x720 format, but panned to extend the field of view. Normally, this mode allows only a ~23' fov, but a ~30' fov is attained here using PIPP and Registax. Wavelet sharpening was applied.

Original Date 5/24/18, 9:13 PM

Make Canon

Camera Canon EOS REBEL T5i

Lens 0.0 mm

Focal Length 0 mm

Metering Mode Center weighted average

ISO Equivalent 200

Exposure Time 1/60s

Aperture ƒ/0

Exposure bias 0 EV

Exposure Program Manual control

White balance Auto white balance

Resolution 1303 x 727
